structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Change in form of government, class, or other status not to affect coverage.
law.text: Any government covered by KRS 67A.360 to 67A.690, which may subsequently change its form of government or its class or other status, shall continue to be covered by KRS 67A.360 to 67A.690.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 30, effective July 1, 1974.
